name: Drunkard's Breath
source: Pathfinder #14: Children of the Void pg. 61
components: V, S, M (a rotten egg or cabbage leaves)
text: This spell emanates from your mouth and functions like stinking cloud, except as noted above. The effect is barely visible and does not obscure vision. The nausea effect resembles that of an extreme hangover. This is a poison effect. Cayden Cailean’s church uses this spell to disperse angry crowds, such as when celebrations get out of hand.
components_zh: 言语，姿势，材料（一个臭鸡蛋或卷心菜叶）
text_zh: 此法术从你口中扩散，效果除上述外如同臭云术。法术效果几乎不可视且不会阻碍视线。法术造成的反胃效果如同严重宿醉。这是一个毒素效果。凯登·凯连的教会使用此法术驱散人群，比如庆功宴上场面失控之类的场景。
